body_html:
There's been some backward incompatible changes: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/c72d891418c326794a913cc13382c104255fe1f2/RELEASE.md#breaking-changes-to-the-api

tf.reverse() now takes indices of axes to be reversed. E.g. tf.reverse(a, [True, False, True]) must now be written as tf.reverse(a, [0, 2]). tf.reverse_v2() will remain until 1.0 final.

does that help?
body_text:

tf.reverse() now takes indices of axes to be reversed. E.g. tf.reverse(a, [True, False, True]) must now be written as tf.reverse(a, [0, 2]). tf.reverse_v2() will remain until 1.0 final.
does that help?
body:
There's been some backward incompatible changes: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/c72d891418c326794a913cc13382c104255fe1f2/RELEASE.md#breaking-changes-to-the-api

`tf.reverse() now takes indices of axes to be reversed. E.g. tf.reverse(a, [True, False, True]) must now be written as tf.reverse(a, [0, 2]). tf.reverse_v2() will remain until 1.0 final.`

does that help?
